name: Sunset Survivor
description:
Explore a foreign planet with nothing but your pick axe to find replacement parts for your ship. Be careful when the sun goes down...

  1. WASD - Move
  2. Spacebar - Jump
  3. Left Click - Attack
  4. Escape - Pause

This game was created for Global Game Jam 2022 by Billy Jackman. The theme this year was Duality. I was going to focus more on the day/ night cycle but ran out of time.

Recommended to be played in full-screen!

Global Game Jam 2022 Submission - https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/sunset-survivor-7

Thanks for playing!
